pr_title: Simplify test code & make more strict

timeline.message:
Revert "Do not verify methods that are not overridden"

This reverts commit e770e4724872a4c5e79224601df0b21bafc3d269.

The code sanctioned forwarding class implementation that does not
implement all the interface method. Such implementation should never
exist as this would open possibility of subtle bugs (e.g. wrong overload
method being called when interface's has a default method delegating to
some other method).

timeline.bodyText: Please rename method from assertProperForwardingMethodsAreCalled to assertForwardingClass and maybe add a javadoc that explains what is a forwarding class.
timeline.author: kokosing

replies.bodyText: this commit is just a revert.
replies.author: findepi
